description:
A half-Earthling half-alien girl, Kyouko is a famous idol which has the ability to create and throw fire at will and becomes a friend with http://anidb.net/ch2362 [Run] when Run portrays an antagonist on her show. She is best known for her role as http://anidb.net/ch11892 [Magical Kyouko], a fictional magical girl character who stars in her own television series that http://anidb.net/ch2355 [Lala] loves watching, often forcing http://anidb.net/ch2354 [Rito] to watch it with her.
Kyouko is based on http://anidb.net/ch2440 [Kirisaki Kyouko] from http://anidb.net/a3321 [Black Cat].
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kirisaki Kyouko
